document.docAuthor: Niu, Ze-Qing, Yuan, Feng, Ascher, John S., Kasparek, Max, Orr, Michael C., Griswold, Terry & Zhu, Chao-Dong
document.masterDocTitle: Bees of the genus Anthidium Fabricius, 1804 (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Megachilidae: Anthidiini) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bees of the genus Anthidium Fabricius, 1804 (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Megachilidae: Anthidiini) from China

subSubSection.paragraph:
( Fig. 15 a–f, female; Fig. 16 a–h, male; Fig. 17 a–f, ♂ ,
A . ( Anthidium ) nigroventralis Wu, 1982
, holotype .)

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 15.
Anthidium ( Anthidium ) kashmirense Mavromoustakis, 1937
. Female. a: Body in lateral view; b: Head in frontal view; c: Clypeus in frontal view; d: Mesosoma in dorsal view; e: Metasoma in dorsal view; f: T4–T6 in dorsal view. Scale bars: 1 mm.

FIGURE 16.
Anthidium ( Anthidium ) kashmirense Mavromoustakis, 1937
. Male. a: Body in lateral view; b: Head in frontal view; c: Clypeus in frontal view; d: Mesosoma in dorsal view; e: Fore wing; f: Metasoma in dorsal view; g: Propodeum in dorsolateral view; h: T5–T7 in dorsal view. Sclae bars: 1 mm.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anthidium ( Anthidium ) nigroventralis Wu, 1982
:
Wu, 2006: 161
, ♂ (redescription), Fig. 83.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 17.
Anthidium ( Anthidium ) nigroventrale Wu, 1982
. Male (Holotype). a: Body in lateral view; b: Head in frontal view; c: Clypeus in frontal view; d: Mesosoma in dorsal view; e: Metasoma in dorsal view, showing T1–T4; f: Type label information. Scale bars: 1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Material examined:
China , Xizang : Burang County ( 30º18′N , 81º06′E ),
5400 m
, 1 ♂ ( holotype ),
21.VII.1976
, leg. Fu-Sheng HUANG
;
Xigazê District , Yadong County , Pali Town , S204 Road- 264km ( 27º24′N , 89º05′E ),
4331 m
, 2 ♀ , 1 ♂ ,
23. VI
.2016, leg. Qing-Tao WU ;
Xigazê District , Yadong County , Pali Tow ( 27º24′N , 89º03′E ),
4332 m
, 2 ♂ ,
8.VII.2018
, leg. Qing-Tao WU
;
Gamba County , Z715 Road- 80km ( 28º07′N , 88º28′E ),
4757 m
, 1 ♀ ,
10.VII.2018
, leg. Qing-Tao WU
.

Type localities.
India : Jammu and Kashmir: Gulmarg , China : Xizang : Burang County
.
Distribution: China ( Xizang ), India ( Jammu and Kashmir , Sikkim ).

Remarks:
Anthidium nigroventrale Wu
is synonymized here with
A. kashmirense Mavromoustakis
based on study of the holotype male of the latter (NHMUK). The female is described for the first time. The holotype of
A. nigroventralis Wu, 1982
(IZCAS) was dissected, but S7–S8, T7, and the genitalia are lost.
